titles.title: Land Conveyance to Tennessee Act of 2007
To convey the parcel of real property known as the John Sevier Range in Knox County, Tennessee, to the State of Tennessee.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Readiness.

bill.summary: 9/5/2007--Introduced. Land Conveyance to Tennessee Act of 2007 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to convey to the State of Tennessee a parcel of real property, including improvements and appurtenant easements, consisting of approximately 124 acres known as the John Sevier Range in Knox County, Tennessee, if the State agrees to use such real property as a public firing range and for associated recreational activities.
